nodes.title: Update Travis CI config to use JDK 8
Add support for murmur3 32 bit hash
Minor refactorings to clean up xxh64 code
Allow creating slices from raw memory addresses
Add a method to create a Slice from a raw memory address
Add methods to wrap any primitive array in a slice
Add accessors for base / offset if you are stupid enough to want to use Unsafe directly.
Convert index checks to assert, giving a significant speed boost.
Ensure that Slice can only operate on native byte-order buffers
Add methods for setting and getting lexicographically sorted long in slice
Fix bug in Slice.compareTo(int, int, Slice, int, int)
Add convenience methods for UTF-8 conversions
Avoid boxing of parameters for checkArgument
Improve performance of filling long value with a single byte
Add comment for readSlice method in SliceInput
Adding build config for supporting PPC64LE
Implement batch double[] read/writes for Slice
Use DirectBuffer interface to get buffer address
Add Travis build for additional JDKs
Slice methods for byte array access
Prevent illegal access warnings on Java 9
Throw SliceTooLargeException when allocating a slice > MAX_ARRAY_SIZE
Return zero positioned HeapByteBuffer from Slice#toByteBuffer
Prevent ensureSize() from growing Slice beyond the limit
Add Travis config for newer JDKs
Add missing bounds check to Slice.setBytes
add interface for reference object of the slice
Allow small ChunkedSliceInput buffer for small data
Make sure to close the output stream
Update getRetainedSize methods in Slice and SliceOutput to return long
Fix Slice retained size calculation to include array headers
Update to Airbase 63 and enable all checkers
Add Slice.longHashCode which returns a 64 bit hashCode
Add method to create unsafe slice from base, address and length
Remove recently added final from OutputStreamSliceOutput
Fix address computation in Slice constructors and add tests
Remove potential boxing from allocation check
Add checks for VM array size limits to Slice allocate
Add support for uint64_t that throws if > LONG_MAX
Improve performance of equals and equalsUnchecked
Refactoring the handling of streams with SliceInput and SliceOutput
Read directly into underlying byte[] when possible
Check for overlong UTF8 representation of surrogate code points
Fix invalid mask when computing length of tail in xxhash64
Include Slice instance size in getRetainedSize()
Making one of the static method public
Use an int for the loop variable
Add utility methods for UTF-8 encoded Slices
